Reviews.Title: Works for me, especially texting!
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Koretsky "DIYer"
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these at my local Fred Meyer, IWireless Sprint network?, and the first one didn't work, but I took it back and they gave me a new one no questions asked. I've had the second one for a year, and have had no problems with it. Reception is very good, battery lasts( I just replaced the original battery a couple of weeks ago), a well made cell phone. Slide out keyboard is awesome, I never texted before, now I'm a texting addict!The only shortcoming I've noticed is the exposed buttons on the main keypad get pressed when you keep it in your shirt pocket, or in a jacket pocket. But I haven't made very many unwanted calls in more than a year.I love it!

Reviews.Title: The Best Phone I've Ever Had.
Reviews.Author: Pop77o7
Reviews.Content: I had this phone for a good while until the battery started to go bad in less than a year. I don't know why I didn't think of just ordering a new battery online (Duhhh)... I'm very hard on my phones. I broke my last one when I got so angry I smashed it! Miraculously it still functioned, though it made the battery life WORSE. Still, it's durable!I just ordered my 2nd one of these today, and I'm so excited!!! Texting on a PHYSICAL keyboard is so much easier and nearly autocorrect errorproof, and that's why I love going for this kind instead of a smartphone (happy with a simple iPod). I also really love the voicemail options where you can record something and use it as a ringtone.So:1. It gets what I want done.2. It has a physical keyboard3. Voice recordings can be made into ringtones.4. It's durable. I smashed it and it still worked. :-PSo excited for my next Rumor 2 (Not smashing it this time.)

Reviews.Title: cell phone
Reviews.Author: bruno
Reviews.Content: what a great phone for the money. it works really well and I am able to text very easily. I would recommend this phone to anyone not needing a high tech phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for price
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: Bought as a replacement for my 12 year old daughters cell phone.  Just what I expected.  Phone worked great right out of the box.  Could not see any signs of wear.  She likes the slide out keyboard for texting.  Great phone for pre-teen, when a smart phone isnt an option.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Elvis
Reviews.Content: It came well and good just that the Charger didnt work,but we had one from the old cell phone and that worked.

Reviews.Title: Fail
Reviews.Author: J. Hicks
Reviews.Content: One of the buttons was working, but half of it was missing.One of the buttons didn't work.The phone was not clean, it had a ton of cosmetic damage.AND the phone still had contacts, messages, pictures, and was registered to a number.Probably stolen. don't buy from this seller

Reviews.Title: locked
Reviews.Author: leona carter
Reviews.Content: I couldnt get the phone to factory reset because it was locked so i never once got to use the phone and didnt want go through the mess of sending it back

Reviews.Title: Terrible!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Britney bansley
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and it was shipped fast. But when I received it it would not hold a charge. If I answer this phone off the charger the phone dies within 20 seconds. Also the buttons double click themselves. If you are texting and hit the delete button sometimes it will delete your entire 2 page message! I cannot use the full keyboard because some of the buttons do not work, others double click themselves and some will turn the phone off! The phone was delivered with a letter that asked to please email them if there was any issue with the phone before leaving a bad review. I did send this email the day after I received the phone. I asked them to send me a new one. I told them if they sent a paid return shipping box with the new phone i would happily return the device i have. I have not even recieved an email back! this was almost a month ago. I have a 2 year old daughter and have to drive around at night with no phone because this one will not stay on! I hate this phone and the people who sold it are scammers!

Reviews.Title: Used Phone
Reviews.Author: MAC
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend. He really likes it. He is suppose to get a new phone but is not in a hurry notw

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Satisfied mommy
Reviews.Content: Awesome. Looks great and works very well. My kid absolutely loves this phone! It was worth every penny in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: misleading
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: The phone is not working correctly, doesnt receive and cant send pictures told by Sprint something wrong phone, and was dirty!

Reviews.Title: Quite a few issues to say the least
Reviews.Author: jeona
Reviews.Content: In the past when I have ordered something that says it will take 1 to 2 business days to receive, I received it in that amount of time. Not the case with this phone. Also when the seller contacted me( I believe I was sent an email first) I expressed my concerns about the shipping time. I got it in a week. I was not satisfied with that, and I asked the seller to make up for it by refunding my shipping fee. I told him that the fact that it did not arrive in the time that it said it would was false advertising. Upon my request for a shipping refund, he accused me of trying to extort money from him. I told him that of course the fact that the product did not arrive when it said it would definitely would affect my review, and if he submitted me a refund for the shipping that would change my review, make it a little better, because I would have received some kind of compensation for my unexpected wait. He accused me of trying to take money out of his family's pocket, and said that extortion was not permitted by amazon, and that he would report me. I told him to go right ahead....I kept all his emails, and emails from other sellers that compensated me when something went wrong. The phone itself is a pretty color, but the screen is quite small and the letters and numbers are a bit hard to see. I was okay with that. If the seller did not have the type of attitude that he did I would have gave him a better rating. I don't feel I did anything wrong....as I said I have been compensated in the past for similar issues or over something else. I wasn't trying to extort money from him for a better review, I was simply stating that the phone did not arrive in the time that it said it would, and if he would refund my shipping fee than that may change my review of the product despite the time when it arrived. I thought that would be fair. I may in fact report him for slander or whatever, because what he said was completely unjustified. Not a good experience. When something says that it will be there in a certain amount of time than that's when it should be there. And if it is not then of course a consumer is going to be not happy with that and sellers have it within their power to make the customer happy. He did not do that, and insulted me on top of it. Beware who you deal with folks and what they say. Those ratings aren't there for nothing. This seller did not have a great rating to begin with, but it was based on six sales so I decided to give the seller a chance. Beware of false advertising.

Reviews.Title: functions almost perfectly fine
Reviews.Author: makeda18
Reviews.Content: it's functional and didn't look shabby. i only needed it as a replacement phone for the one that i lost. i only needed to call and text...mostly text. the only thing about it was that it changed time zones frequently, but that wasn't too big of an issue, really.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Moe
Reviews.Content: I like this phone, I bought to use it for emergency, it has what I need and the sound/mic is so good, loud and clear...

Reviews.Title: Got what I paid for
Reviews.Author: Miranda Scznsny
Reviews.Content: I was told everything about the phone before I purchased it and everything was just like it said. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Not up to standards
Reviews.Author: Dan Bentley
Reviews.Content: The keyboard does not work very well and the phone was all scratched up which was not specified in the ad. Also, the battery case has a bunch of flowers on it which also was not specified in the ad. Over 200 contacts were left in the phone along with missed calls. Somewhat unproffesional. This is quality I would expect had i bought it off craigslist.

Reviews.Title: it's working, we're using it
Reviews.Author: satik
Reviews.Content: it's working, we're using it, but it came in so dirty, it is a shame, how it could be sent like that. The owner was a hard smoker, the phone smelled like s***, the package was very-very smelly, even the envelope. I have to say, however, it was packed carefully and thoughtfully.Thanks, I guess ... Conflicting and mixed review :-)

Reviews.Title: cell phone
Reviews.Author: wendell alberry jr
Reviews.Content: my wife broke her phone and wanted one with a key board and liked mine she seen this one and wanted it so we got it and she loves it

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price!!!
Reviews.Author: SKRAPPY13
Reviews.Content: Got this phone for my teenage son (Since all he does is text) .... The phone was described as "USED" ..... when it arrived i was amazed at how "NEW" it looked and felt.... My son is very happy with his phone, and for the price, you cant beat it!

Reviews.Title: Great protector of phone.
Reviews.Author: Mona111
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy.  I actually bought the color red to change the color of my phone. And it is now protecting my phone as well as giving it a different look. Fits perfectly. I highly reccomend.TR Mac

Reviews.Title: VERY DISAPPOINTING!
Reviews.Author: tracy
Reviews.Content: I feel like I got ripped off with this phone. Not because of the phone but because the seller put it out there as slightly used, and it has so many issues it is not enough room to put it all. The biggest issue is the cost vs the worth. I paid 40$ for a SLIGHTLY used phone that barely works. The buttons stick, it shuts off constantly, and wont hold a chrge. So the battery is useless! I have never been more unhappy with a product before like this. I waited 10 days to replace a phone that doesnt work for another phone I spend money on that doesn't work!

Reviews.Title: phone didnt activate on Sprint Network
Reviews.Author: gonzalo
Reviews.Content: Well although the picture and caption both say Sprint, the phone itself was not branded as such and onlythe manufacturer name of LG was present on the front of the phone.  A reset of the phone did not allow thephone to be activated to the Sprint network and two different Sprint techs tried but could not find thephone in their phone database which of course also meant they couldnt activate the phone.  The phone itselfwas in great condition, also the delivery was fast.  Since the phone didnt activate I returned it to theAmazon vendor and there were no problems communicating the issue and returning the phone.  Well cant winthem all and this was good experience with this vendor even tho the phone did not work out.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Battery?? No Charger?? Are You Kidding Me?
Reviews.Author: Mr. Mambo
Reviews.Content: I needed a cheap and reliable phone that was NOT a smart phone. Maybe I am naïve. I assumed that when I ordered this used phone through Amazon, from OEM Battery Supply, I would get a charger and a battery and perhaps, a booklet or receipt which told me the serial number of the phone. I even paid extra to get the phone sooner but it took almost a week to get it. It seems solid and everything but unfortunately I cannot use it because the battery that the seller included DOES NOT FIT THE PHONE! And this is from a company which calls themselves a battery supply company (those two words (Battery Supply) are actually in their company name! I wrote them an email and included my work phone in hopes that they would call me and try to make it right. But so far, nothing. If I had known that the phone would not include a charger I would never have purchased it. Then with the the battery problem.....total pain!!

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: Orisa
Reviews.Content: Phone was clean internally (no personal pics or contact information) and externally!  A phone charger was included.  Extra ring tones.  Battery life is EXCELLENT!!!

Reviews.Title: Disapointment.
Reviews.Author: VanillaWaffer
Reviews.Content: Although it came very quickly, the phone itself is bad. The screen was glitched and broken, and you have to buy your own battery for it. I thought maybe the phone would fix itself once it was registered as my phone instead of the previous user, but it's still pretty useless. I do not recommend getting this product. I hope that this was just a one time screw up, and maybe perhaps they have better phones. Either way I won't be buying from them again.

Reviews.Title: sprint lg rumor 2
Reviews.Author: PHYLLIS
Reviews.Content: This phone i ordered i wasnt happy with how it came to me & how it didnt have an owners manuel no receipt. no instructions.

This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
